name: Vintage Wooden Chair
description: A beautifully crafted vintage wooden chair, perfect for your living room or office space. Sturdy, comfortable, and adds a rustic charm.

name: Classic Floor Lamp
description: A stylish floor lamp with adjustable brightness. Ideal for cozy reading corners or to enhance home decor.

name: Hardly-used Bicycle
description: A gently used bicycle in excellent condition. Smooth ride, perfect for daily commuting or weekend adventures.

name: Set of Novels
description: A curated set of popular novels, perfect for book lovers. All books are in good condition and ready to read.

name: Ceramic Plant Pot
description: A simple and elegant ceramic plant pot, perfect for indoor plants. Adds a touch of style to any corner.

name: Retro Toaster
description: A retro-style toaster in working condition. Perfect for quick breakfasts and adds vintage vibes to your kitchen.

name: Comfortable Sofa
description: A plush and comfortable sofa, perfect for living rooms. Comes with cushions and is in excellent condition.

name: Winter Jacket
description: A warm winter jacket, suitable for cold weather. Stylish, lightweight, and in great condition.

name: Kids Toy Set
description: A fun and colorful toy set for kids. Safe, durable, and hours of entertainment guaranteed.

name: Kitchen Mixer
description: A versatile kitchen mixer, perfect for baking and cooking. Works like new and adds convenience to your kitchen.
